low s and lows in the upper s Monday Partly cloudy with isolated thunderstorms Highs near and lows in the upper s Original Message From SCOTT TICHAVSKY mailto CTINCCOM Sent Tuesday August AM To Travis Baughman Scott Michal Rodney Hardegree Jay Purdom Don Baughman David Kubala Subject Fw This Weekend This is a message I got from Joe yesterday about Saturday night It makes me no difference if yall want to go out for an evening on the town Sounds good to me Some of us are heading over to Roger Creager at Garden in the Heights Thursday evening I dont know if we really need to meet to discuss the weekend or not I am handling all of the food for the weekend and the only other issue is who is riding with who Jay is taking his Expedition We are leaving from my house Friday afternoon So Don Travis and Gerald will be coming from the Clear Lake area and I guess are planning on riding together The question is do yall want to meet us at my house I have a map I can fax over or you can look up where we are staying on the internet and get directions The website is willowcreekranchtexascom There are directions on the website Jay wants to meet tomorrow at the skeet range off of Westheimer if anyone is interested in doing that You can call him at that is his cell number Please read the message below also Scott Original Message From Joe Ebert To Scott Tichavsky Sent Monday August PM Subject This Weekend Scotty In case you did not know The Brady Goat Cookoff will be this weekend Brady is about a minute drive from where we are staying We went last year and the music was great and there were tons of women If the group is up to it that may be an option We could just bring a change of clothes hunting and head out Just throwing out ideas If we decide to go that route then lets not worry about dinner for Saturday Send out an email to everyone if you are interested Joe
